mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_account (name_user, pass_word, mail, phone_number, del_flg, role_flg, address) VALUES (#{nameAccount}, #{passWord}, #{mail}, #{phoneNumber}, #{delFlg}, #{roleFlg}, #{address});
mapper.update: UPDATE user_account SET name_user = #{nameAccount}, pass_word = #{passWord}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, del_flg = #{delFlg}, role_flg = #{roleFlg}, address = #{address}, up_date_date = #{upDateDate}, mail = #{mail} WHERE ID = #{id};
